title: Number of people requiring treatment for neglected tropical diseases
subtitle:
Number of people requiring treatment and care for any one of the neglected tropical diseases (NTDs)
targeted by the WHO NTD Roadmap. This is not equal to the number of people at risk for NTDs - mass treatment is common in districts above a threshold for prevalence. This number can better be interpreted as the number of people at a level of risk requiring medical intervention â€“ that is, treatment and care for NTDs.
